Sentece: Although BCP had a long half-life (over 8.5 h), the preliminary pharmacokinetic parameters (0-8 h) were determined: t 1/2, 8.52 +/- 1.96 h; AUC, 419.9 +/- 45.2 microg x h/ml; MRT, 3.29 +/- 0.11 h; CLtot, 5.93 +/- 0.54 ml/h; and Vdss, 19.5 +/- 1.3 l.
Title: Metabolism of bucolome in rats. Stability and biliary excretion of bucolome N-glucuronide.
